title: Color Lottery
text: Welcome to a color-based lottery smart contract a substrate blockchain! Here, you can participate in a decentralized and transparent lottery by purchasing tickets of a specific color.
label: Buy a ticket

title: Rules
text: A ticket is a bet on a specific colour in HEX format. The price of a ticket is 1 microunit. The ticket is always valid for the current round and each colour is sold a maximum of eight times per round. A round consists of several draws. The round ends when the jackpot is won. The jackpot consists of 100% of the revenue from the tickets sold in a round.

title: Source
text: As a developer, I prioritize the concept of open source. That's why the entire code for this lottery is freely accessible and can be viewed, modified, and distributed by anyone.
